bit-field.name: RSTDISBL
bit-field.description: Reset Disabled (Enable PC6 as i/o pin)

bit-field.name: EESAVE
bit-field.description: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

bit-field.name: AINC
bit-field.description: MOb Data Buffer Auto Increment (Active Low)

bit-field.name: DLCW
bit-field.description: Data Length Code Warning on MOb

bit-field.name: AC1ICE
bit-field.description: Analog Comparator 1 Interrupt Capture Enable Bit

bit-field.name: DACL
bit-field.description: DAC Data Register Low Byte Bits

bit-field.name: DACH
bit-field.description: DAC Data Register High Byte Bits

bit-field.name: RWWSRE
bit-field.description: Read While Write section read enable

bit-field.name: COM0A
bit-field.description: Compare Output Mode, Phase Correct PWM Mode

bit-field.name: OCIE0B
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter0 Output Compare Match B Interrupt Enable

bit-field.name: OCIE0A
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter0 Output Compare Match A Interrupt Enable

bit-field.name: OCIE1B
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output CompareB Match Interrupt Enable

bit-field.name: OCIE1A
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output CompareA Match Interrupt Enable

register.name: ADCSRA
register.description: The ADC Control and Status register

register.name: ADCSRB
register.description: ADC Control and Status Register B

bit-field.name: MUX
bit-field.description: Analog Channel and Gain Selection Bits

bit-field.name: LID
bit-field.description: Identifier bit 5 or Data Length bits

bit-field.name: LAINC
bit-field.description: Auto Increment of Data Buffer Index (Active Low)

bit-field.name: LINDX
bit-field.description: FIFO LIN Data Buffer Index bits
